about_the_game:
Brawler Bots is a dungeon clearing + pvp game taking place in a world of robots. As you hack & slash your way through unending armies of virus infected robots with your friends in order to save the leaders of this world and return peace to Topanok, you’ll amass hoards of powerful equipment to amp up and customize your robot with your own unique sense of style. Once you’re finished saving the world, take that same gear into PVP and test your metal against the top players in a highly competitive environment in several different game modes! Do you have what it takes to be #1?


Customization to your robot is unique!




In the current day all of the societies of Topanok have fallen. A virus, coming from seemingly nowhere, has spontaneously corrupted all of Topanok and left only violent, warped bots to inhabit the husks of their fallen civilizations. Only four bots from Nicolia were lucky enough to avoid being infected by the virus. It’s up to them to hunt down the leaders of the five fallen civilizations, beat the virus out of them, and discover the truth of the virus that has ruined Topanok!



MUTA - The Brute Bot: Muta is the perfect mix between defense and offense. If you’re looking for a balanced playstyle where you can give it as well as you can take it, then this is the bot for you.



SANO - The Tank Bot: Sano is the largest, most hardy bot. They’re the shield of the party that rushes in head first and takes all of the beatings for their team. If your goal is to lead the charge and take on packs of infected at once, Sano is your pick.



CAZA - The Fighter Bot: Cazo is speed and brutality incarnate. Built for violence, Cazo is the hardest hitting of all of the four bots. If your goal is to be the primary damage dealer of your team then this might be the bot for you.



KIZA - The Healer Bot: Kiza is the bot that holds it all together. The only bot capable of repairing other bots in the heat of battle. It might be a thankless job, but if your goal is to keep your party from dying and be the unsung hero of the story then Kiza might interest you.


Learn More About Brawler BOTS! At our official website here!

Official Trailer Coming Soon!
Don't Forget to join our Discord for exclusive early access before releasing!
Want to see more on Brawler BOTS? Go over to our website connected here to see all things Brawler BOTS!
For Most recent updates be sure to join the discord!

name: Brawler BOTS!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Video
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Dungeon clearing + pvp , in a world of robots. Fully customize your own robot to hack & slash your way through virus infected bots, Save the world, then take that gear into PVP and test your metal against the top players in a competitive environment! Do you have what it takes to be #1?
